# <a name="print-an-attachment-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="d45a1-102">Imprima um anexo em Outlook.com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d45a1-102">Print an attachment in Outlook.com</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="d45a1-103">Abra a mensagem que contém o anexo que pretende imprimir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d45a1-103">Open the message that contains the attachment you want to print.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="d45a1-104">Mova o cursor sobre o anexo e selecione o ícone **Mais ações**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d45a1-104">Move your cursor over the attachment and select the **More actions** icon</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="d45a1-105">> **Download**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d45a1-105">> **Download**.</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="d45a1-106">Depois de o ficheiro ter sido descarregado, abra-o com o programa apropriado e escolha a opção de imprimir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d45a1-106">After the file has downloaded, open it with the appropriate program and choose the option to print.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d45a1-107">Por exemplo, abra um ficheiro .doc no Word e, em seguida, imprima.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d45a1-107">For example, open a .doc file in Word and then print.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d45a1-108">Para mais informações, leia [Imprimir o artigo Mensagens de correio e artigo, anexos e calendários em Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/c835b8e5-b310-4cab-ac15-b6eb95149855?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d45a1-108">For more information, read [Print email messages, attachments, and calendars in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/c835b8e5-b310-4cab-ac15-b6eb95149855?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
